Html:
Dear developers:

I recently purchased a old Windows 2000 Server lisence to host and deploy my own personal web site. Actually i am using BlogEngine.NET as blogging platform, which runs smoothly and perfectly on my server.

I would like to try/migrate to Oxite but I can't afford buying a Windows 2003/8 Server lisence. So my cuestion is:

Is it possible to make it run also under Microsoft Windows 2000 Server?

Greetings from Spain!!!.

P.d.: Visit my web at: http://www.gunner.es

;-)
